title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: Nor be all computer work be yahoo work. I hear one story say EFCC arrest one young guy wey be crypto trader because say him talk say him dey make one million per week. Dem talk say na yahoo the guy dey do. Dem carry the guy go their office  come tell am make him show proof of work. Within 3 days, they guy don make over 900k naira. Dem shock leave the guy.The moral of this story be say make we just dey focus dey do our thing as relating to Bitcoin and cryptocurrency. Make we try make sure say we Sabi the thing Wella because one day, we fit dey situation wey be say na our proof of work fit save us and not even who we sabi. How una reason the matter?You fit read the full gist here- https://twitter.com/Cryptopidgin3/status/1653552826289627136?t=JA5SzbtmFEHULHnHJpTfVA&s=19

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Things like this can only happen in Nigeria because, some of ur guys don't use to hide themselves when way pure 4 them in crypto trading than to see them in all streets with girls and expensive cars that can help someone to invest and become somebody in future. Not that am supporting what ur EFCC is doing to Naija people that made their money in a genuine way, but dey just believed that every successful young guys in the town are yahoo guys which is not true, and this young guy case has proven to them that hard working youths are still making it in crypto. But we still need to advise our crypto users not to show themselves in public because, there is hunger in the land which EFCC and police don't use eye see crypto users.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: This one sweet me infact the story don make my evening already because plenty people now believe say once you dey do something wey involve laptops and iPhone you be yahoo boy and this matter don make some people no fit move for road with dia system and good phones again make efcc no harras dem for wetin dem no do.I for like know wetin happen laslas since the guy show dem good proof of how em dey make em money I hope say dem no go begin ask am to drop something because na dia way be that and like say our country good the guy get right to sue dem for gross misconduct and maltreatment because I believe say dem forcely arrest am.

comments.author: MeCsc
comments.body: It's now a stereotypes that anyone making money online is a fraudster in Nigeria but with this type of news Nigerians will know, one can become rich young without doing any illegal jobs with just doing the right thing consistently.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on May 04, 2023, 04:16:05 PMNor be all computer work be yahoo work. I hear one story say EFCC arrest one young guy wey be crypto trader because say him talk say him dey make one million per week. Dem talk say na yahoo the guy dey do. Dem carry the guy go their office  come tell am make him show proof of work. Within 3 days, they guy don make over 900k naira. Dem shock leave the guy.I’m not in support of what EFCC did to him but this would have been avoided if he hadn’t posted about his income in public that made EFCC come looking for him. Even your close friends and enemies who are envy of you can set traps for you to see your downfall. It’s advisable you don’t disclose your source of income to the public until an occasion warrants you to do so.QuoteThe moral of this story be say make we just dey focus dey do our thing as relating to Bitcoin and cryptocurrency. Make we try make sure say we Sabi the thing Wella because one day, we fit dey situation wey be say na our proof of work fit save us and not even who we sabi. How una reason the matter?It is good to know what you’re doing and be perfect at your craft always because it is very important and can save you at any time. These days, you’ll see Nigerians are used to posting stuffs like (Active, Zelle, Cash App) on their statuses imitating other people that does that. And put a caption like, ‘I don’t know whether this thing dey bring money but make i post am too’. If they’re caught is such cases, how can they be able to proof that’s not their work or it’s their work which they can’t prove and knows nothing about them.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: De matta make sense Wella and it dey remind us say make we dey always try dey pit hand for legal tins as sources of income in case one day bad belle people try run us to the law enforcement we go fit defend oursef based on how legit our hustle be.It's just unfortunate say nowadays weneva people see young boy dey make money for him early 20s dem dey rush tag am as yahoo guy but to me all of that na due to ignorance. Cos at this level of 21C people don supos understand say beta legit  hustles dey for de internet wey technology don make am easier for us to partake in without plenty restrictive regulations.
